scrape some data off a website? extract contact leads off a directory? scrape products off a website? be informed of your competitor's pricing? get data feed weekly from a website?

Want to

ExactData scrape and deliver just exactly what you need. Past client reviews.

What to Expect

  • High quality data: accurate, no missing records, no duplicates, intuitively structured
  • Fast turnaround: most of the times, it'll take us 1-3 days to deliver. Some will require a week.
  • Affordable price: we're not the cheapest out there, but definitely will get you a reasonable price.
  • High success rate: over 95% your job will be completed successfully. If we fail to do it, your'll be charged nothing, of course.
  • Responsive communication: you'll be updated with the work status daily.
